pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models

Class ChangeCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.ChangeCounter

  • public class ChangeCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class for counting code changes of different types. It holds a separate, internal counter for each change type.
    Author:
    Adam Wierzbicki
